sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Some time after they married, Anna was diagnosed with acute leukemia and she has been hospitalized for quite some time.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: After work, Will always rushes his way to the hospital.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Hoping that Anna will be cured someday. Today is no different, he rushes his way just to be together with Anna.
